title: Monorepo
content: The key technological [enabler](https://monorepo.tools/) of the lasagnoli approach.

title: Shared libraries
content: "One tool to solve one problem" curtails proliferation of technologies and allows for a high degree of reuse.

title: A lattice team structure
content: Product teams organized around a domain (vertical) with guilds organized around technology (horizontal). This allows for a high degree of autonomy and alignment.

title: Modular and universal CI/CD
content: Keeps building artifacts fast, manageable and understandable. [MPyL](https://vandebron.github.io/mpyl/mpyl.html) is a tool that helps with this.
